name: HawaiiSurfReport
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Hawaii Surf Report brings you daily & weekly reports on wave activity across the Hawaiian islands. Enable this Skill, then say Alexa, whats my flash briefing or Alexa, whats in the news to hear the audio. Feeds include the latest Surf forecast for the Maui, Oahu, Kauai, The Big Island.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
